snippet.title: SKIES Features Overview
snippet.description: Skiesverse is the first Web3 post-apocalyptic tactical RPG with user-driven economics and tokenomics. The Product is on the edge of Web2 and Web3 in GameFi development. The Game where circular economics and tokenomics are fully controlled by players, who are enabled to mine for resources, produce goods, fight for resource points, own and manage manufacturing businesses, etc.
